summary: Completed comprehensive testing of StockFolio Brazilian Stock Portfolio Analysis App. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend landing page is working perfectly with all required elements present and properly styled. Authentication system is working as designed, requiring OAuth flow for dashboard access.
passed_tests: API Health Check - GET /api/ returns correct message
Stock Search API - GET /api/stocks/search/PETR4 returns stock data
Stock Search API - GET /api/stocks/search/VALE3 returns stock data
Authentication API - GET /api/auth/me with Bearer token works
Portfolio Operations - GET /api/portfolio/stocks works
Portfolio Operations - POST /api/portfolio/stocks successfully adds stock
Portfolio Summary - GET /api/portfolio/summary works
Dividends API - GET /api/dividends works
Dividends API - POST /api/dividends successfully adds dividend
Valuation API - POST /api/valuation/calculate works with Gordon, Bazin, DCF models
Landing Page - StockFolio logo and title present
Landing Page - 'Entrar com Google' button present and clickable (data-testid='login-btn')
Landing Page - 'Começar Agora' button present and clickable (data-testid='get-started-btn')
Landing Page - 'Criar Conta Grátis' CTA button present and clickable (data-testid='cta-btn')
Landing Page - All four features present: Gestão de Carteira, Análise de Dividendos, Preço Teto, Análise com IA
Landing Page - Hero section and footer properly structured
Landing Page - Responsive design elements working
Frontend-Backend Integration - Basic API calls work from browser
Frontend-Backend Integration - Stock search API works from browser
Frontend-Backend Integration - Authenticated API calls work with Bearer token

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (Landing page fully functional, authentication system working as designed)
